sentence.Network_en: Mediterranean liliaceous plants; sometimes placed in family Hyacinthaceae.
sentence.Network_cn: 地中海百合科植物; 有时归入风信子科.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 弹簧草为风信子科（Hyacinthaceae）Albuca属多年生鳞茎类肉质植物，植株具圆形或不规则形鳞茎，其鳞茎由一层层肥厚的肉质鳞片 …

means.word_mean: 1. one of many families or subfamilies in which some classification systems subdivide the Liliaceae but not widely accepted
